entry.def: If you goggle at something, you stare at it with your eyes wide open, usually because you are surprised by it.
Goggles are large glasses that fit closely to your face around your eyes to protect them from such things as water, wind, or dust.

means.word_mean: 1. spectacles worn to protect the eyes
